title: The Dark Powers that Bind
description: The Dark Powers That Bind is a non-fictional examination of our ancient cultures, beginning with the oldest civilizations, and the origins of the primal religion that was cloned, divided and modified to suit regional preferences as it spread into the whole world.This book contains twelve sections, each devoted to a geographical area or continent, tracing the historical developments in the major systems of beliefs and describing how they expanded from their earliest source.Packed with detailed research, authoritative references and numerous images from the world's archaeological remains and museums, this book will tell you all about the dark powers that bind, from their beginnings to the farthest reaches of the globe. Comparisons with true spirituality are made in each section.
author: Peter Dunstan
